active.description: Click on a button to view the related match.
active.invalid: Invalid match selected, please try again.
active.none: No Active Matches that you can manage.
active.title: Active Matches

report.player: Did you win or lose this match?

blacklist.invalid: Valid Player not provided! Are they a bot account?

cancel.description: Any future attempts to report this score will not work.
cancel.moderator: Ask a mod to cancel this game for you!
cancel.title: Match {{id}} was cancelled.
cancel.error: You cannot cancel a match that has already been reported.

base.title: Configure the Bot
base.description: Select from the dropdown below, if you want to view settings, or update the queue/server settings

settings.title: View Settings
settings.description: View the settings for the server and the current queue.

guild.title: Server Settings
guild.description: Select the element from the dropdown below that you want to update.

modRole.title: Mod Role
modRole.description: Users with this role will be allowed to use the moderator commands for the bot

setting.description: Select a new **Mod Role** for the server or select reset to remove.

singleQueue.title: Single Queue
singleQueue.description: When enabled, the server will share one common queue, else each channel will be it's own queue

matchTimeout.title: Match Timeout
matchTimeout.description: How long in hours until matches Auto-Cancel themselves

updated.title: Match Timeout Updated
updated.description: Match Timeout was set to **{{size}}** days

bestOf.title: Best Of Size
bestOf.description: How many games should be played per series?

vcCategory.title: VC Category
vcCategory.description: Which category should the bot create voice channels in for the match? This can be Disabled

setting.description: Select a new **VC Category** or select reset to remove.
setting.reset: Don't create VCs on match creation.

language.title: Language
language.description: Which language should the bot speak in your server?

mentionRole.title: Mention Role
mentionRole.description: What role should be mentioned on queue start? This is used in queues that don't have a Mention Role set

setting.description: Select a new **Guild Mention Role** for the server or select reset to remove.

updated.title: Guild Mention Role Updated
updated.new: Guild Mention role was set to **{{role}}**

requiredRole.title: Required Role
requiredRole.description: What role is required to join the queue? This is used in queues that don't have a Required Role set

setting.description: Select a new **Guild Required Role** for the server or select reset to remove.

updated.title: Guild Required Role Updated
updated.new: Guild Required role was set to **{{role}}**

queue.title: Queue Settings
queue.description: Select the element from the dropdown below that you want to update.

teamSize.title: Team Size
teamSize.description: How many people should be on each team?

randomCaptains.title: Random Captains
randomCaptains.description: Should captains be random, or the top rated in the lobby?

queueTimeout.title: Queue Timeout
queueTimeout.description: How long until a player is removed from the queue for inactivity.

showRoom.title: Show Room
showRoom.description: Should this room be shown on the leaderboard?

mentionRole.title: Mention Role
mentionRole.description: What role should be mentioned on queue start?

setting.description: Select a new **Guild Mention Role** for the server or select reset to remove.

updated.title: Guild Mention Role Updated
updated.new: Guild Mention role was set to **{{role}}**

requiredRole.title: Required Role
requiredRole.description: What role is required to join the queue?

setting.description: Select a new **Required Role** for the server or select reset to remove.

embed.author: This will time out in 2 minutes.
embed.description: Click below to pick players for your team.
embed.title: Team Selection
embed.id: Match ID (use this when reporting the score)

starter.title: You have 2 minutes to vote. Vote by clicking the buttons below.
starter.description: This message needs to have **{{count}}** player interactions to proceed!

return.title: Voting complete!
return.description: The vote has been completed. The results are:

picking.title: Picking Teams
picking.description: Captains will now pick their team members!

cron.remove: Players removed from the queue after inactivity

warning.description: Click below to extend the time you have in Queue!
warning.title: Players to be removed from queue in under 5 minutes!

prompt.description: Are you sure you want to delete your data? This cannot be undone.
prompt.title: Delete Data

success.description: Your data has been removed from our databases.
success.title: Data Deleted

deleteData.error:
This command can only be run in the #data-deletion-request channel in the Private 6 Mans support server.
Type /invite for an invite link to that server.

queued.title: Player Already Queued
queued.description: The Selected player is already in the current queue.

captain.dm: I can't send a DM to {{captain}}, are you allowing DMs? (Team Picking Cancelled)
captain.time: {{captain}} out of time to choose players. (Team Picking Cancelled)

interactionCreate.embed: I can't create an embed, please fix that!

unknown.description: Post this code in the #error-report channel in the Private 6 Mans Support Server so that we can look into it.

permissions.footer: I need the permissions listed above to allow me to run smoothly!
permissions.title: Missing Permissions:
permissions.user: You don't have permission to use this command
permissions.premium: You need to be a premium player to use this feature.

match.found: No match found with that ID.
match.id: No ID provided, please provide a match ID.

command.short: For more information about a command, run `/help command [command name]`
command.long:
For more information about a command, run `/help command [command name]`. 
Run `/help all` to see a list of all commands.

data.title: Want to make a request to delete your match and player data?
data.description: In the Support server linked, go to the #data-deletion-request channel. In that channel, type /deletedata.

developer.title: This is a **developer** command
developer.description: Only the bot developers can run this command.

moderator.title: This is a **moderator** command
moderator.description: Only users with the designated Private 6 Mans Moderator role, users with Administrator, or Manage Server permissions can run this command.

public.title: This is a **public** command
public.description: All users can run this command, unless they are blacklisted.

issues.title: Having issues?
issues.description: Make sure the bot has Read Messages, Send Messages, Embed Links and Add Reactions permissions. Also make sure everyone in the lobby can receive DMs from the bot.

invite.title: Want to use the bot in your own server?

match.summary:
Match {{matchId}} has been reported!
Team {{teamId}} won, the scores have been reported. Happy Playing! 

Rating breakdown for match given below.

queue.invalid: Valid player not provided! Are they blacklisted or a bot account?

notPermitted.title: Player not able to join Queue
notPermitted.description: {{player}} is not allowed to join the current queue.

notFound.title: Player not in queue.
notFound.description: {{player}} is not present in the current queue.

error.role: You don't have the required role to Queue!

error.matchResult: No result provided, please provide a result.
error.report: You cannot report a match you are not a part of.

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset stats? This cannot be undone.

invalid.queued: Valid player not provided! Are they a part of the match?
invalid.replacement: Valid player not provided! Are they a part of the match already, a bot, or blacklisted?

substitute.description: {{player}} has been substituted for {{replacement}} in match {{id}}!

undo.description: You can now report the score correctly.
undo.title: Match {{id}} was undone.
undo.error: You can only undo a match that has been reported or cancelled.
